resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Frequency
\n\nF = The letter F means Frequency of feeding the child. The child should be fed 5 times in 12 hours day time which represents 3 hours feeding interval. For example 6am-9am-12pm-3pm-6pm.

Adequancy
\n\nA = The letter A means Adequacy of the food given to the child. Adequacy means the child should be fed enough quantity of food to meet the needs satisfactory.

Density
\n\nD = The letter D means Density of the food given to the child. Density means the amount of nutrients and energy per unit size of food and the child should be given correct amounts of nutrients and energy to meet the needs satisfactory.

Diversification


D = The letter D means Diversification of the foods given to the child. Diversification means number of the food groups available per meal given to the child, the child should be given at least 4 food groups per day.


1. Staple food for example ( maize and rice) 
2. Food from animals for example (meat and eggs) 
3. Legumes for example (beans and cow peas) 
4. Fruits for example (mangoes and banana) 
5. Vegetables for example (Chinese and lettuce) 
6. Fats for example ( oil and groundnuts)

Hygiene


H = The letter H means Hygiene practices and good sanitation infrastructures availability at household.


Hygiene tips/


Wash hands with disinfectant soap

1. After visiting the toilet

2. Before and after eating or feeding a baby

3. After changing baby nappies

4. Whenever the hands are dirty


Sanitation tips 

The household where the undernourished child is coming from should have good sanitation infrastructures.

1. Toilet

2. Bathroom

3. Kitchen

4. Drying rack

5. Rubbish pit

Utilization
\n\nU = The letter U means Utilization of the food given to the child. The parent/guardian should make sure the child is eating the food given in adequate quantity.

Active Participation
\n\nA = The letter A means Active Participation of all family members in the child caring.

Consult Nutritionist
\n\nC = The letter C means Consulting nutritionist at the nearest Health Center or Hospital if there is no improvement after following these advices for period of time.
